document_data.name: ''Mortissa's Beads of Rigor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mortissa's beads of rigor''''' wan an [[enchanted]] necklace made out of finger bones, from the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Powers: The magic necklace allowed the wearer to cast the ''[[halt undead]]'' spell. ''Mortissa's beads of rigor'' held seven charges of the spell.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Mortissa's beads of rigor'' could be uncovered in the Lower Keep levels of the [[Elven Catacombs]], hidden within a locked old chest among possessions of [[orog]] marauders who laired there.
